hero.description: We are here to deliver digital products that feel futuristic yet human. Combining micro-interactions, glassmorphism elements, and smooth animations to create memorable experiences.

intro.title: ekalliptus — Leading Digital Solutions
intro.subtitle: Transform your business with Indonesian website development, custom WordPress, mobile app development, and other professional digital services.

about.heading: Leading Digital <highlight>Transformation</highlight>
about.philosophyDesc: We believe every business has a unique story that deserves a strong digital presence. That’s why our approach prioritizes intuitive user experiences, high performance, and sustainable SEO strategies.
about.commitmentDesc: The ekalliptus team is made up of experienced developers, creative designers, and project managers who accompany your project from concept to launch. As a leading digital partner, we ensure every project is optimized for Google search performance.

cta.note: Reach us through the <link>order form</link> for a free consultation and receive a tailored proposal for your business needs.

services.title: Digital transformation with an elegant touch
services.subtitle: Craft distinctive digital experiences with 3D elements, glassmorphism, and subtle interactions that keep users engaged at every step.

websiteDevelopment.title: Website Development
websiteDevelopment.description: Build responsive, user-friendly websites tailored to your business goals.

wordpressDevelopment.title: WordPress Development
wordpressDevelopment.description: Customize WordPress to match your needs with premium themes and plugins.

berduPlatform.title: Berdu Platform
berduPlatform.description: Powerful Berdu-based platform solutions for modern business operations.

mobileAppDevelopment.title: Mobile App Development
mobileAppDevelopment.description: Innovative Android & iOS applications designed for seamless experiences.

serviceHpLaptop.title: Device Repair Service
serviceHpLaptop.description: Certified technicians providing trusted repair for phones and laptops.

photoVideoEditing.title: Photo & Video Editing
photoVideoEditing.description: Professional editing services delivering high-quality visual results.

about.title: About Us
about.innovationDesc: Ekalliptus is an Indonesia-based digital agency specializing in digital transformation for modern businesses. With over 5 years of industry experience, we have helped hundreds of clients from SMEs to enterprises achieve their digital vision.
about.qualityDesc: Our services include responsive and SEO-friendly website development, custom WordPress with complete plugin integration, cross-platform mobile app development using React Native and Flutter.
about.teamDesc: HP and laptop repair services with certified technicians, as well as professional photo and video editing for impactful marketing content using software like Adobe Premiere, After Effects, and Photoshop.
about.technologyDesc: We provide affordable yet high-quality website development services in Indonesia using modern technology.
about.localDesc: Specialists in WordPress custom Jakarta for local business needs and mobile app development for startups to enterprises.
about.resultsDesc: With a focus on professional digital agency, Ekalliptus has become the top choice for HP laptop services in Jakarta and surrounding areas.
about.commitment: We prioritize client satisfaction by providing results that are not only aesthetic but also functional. Every website development Indonesia project we work on always follows the latest SEO best practices to ensure maximum visibility on Google search engines.
about.contactForm: Contact us through the order form for free consultation and get a custom proposal according to your business needs in Indonesia.

contact.insightsDesc: From interactive landing pages to dynamic dashboards, we design every detail to feel immersive and stand out from competitors.

contactCTA.title: Ready to launch your project?
contactCTA.description: Start a conversation with us and see how immersive design can elevate your brand perception and bring users closer to your product.
contactCTA.whatsappMessage: Hello ekalliptus, I’d like to consult about the services you offer. Could you please assist me?
contactCTA.emailBody:
Hello ekalliptus,

I’d like to consult about the services you currently offer. I appreciate your assistance.

Thank you.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about our website development, custom WordPress, mobile app development, and other digital services at ekalliptus.

items.question: How long does website development take?
items.answer: Project timelines vary depending on complexity. A simple company profile site typically takes 2–3 weeks, while an e-commerce or complex web application can take 1–3 months. We will share a detailed schedule after the initial needs analysis.

items.question: Do you provide website maintenance after launch?
items.answer: Yes, we offer maintenance packages that include regular updates, data backups, security monitoring, and technical support. Packages are tailored to your business needs, from monthly to annual maintenance.

items.question: Is WordPress development suitable for large-scale businesses?
items.answer: Absolutely! Our WordPress solutions scale for enterprise needs with custom plugins, high-performance optimization, and complex system integrations. Many leading brands rely on WordPress as their CMS thanks to its flexibility and robust plugin ecosystem.

items.question: What is the ordering process at ekalliptus?
items.answer: It’s simple: (1) Fill out the order form with your project details, (2) Our team reaches out within 24 hours to discuss further, (3) We send a proposal and quotation, (4) After approval, we begin development with clear milestones, (5) Testing and revisions, (6) Launch and project handover.

items.question: Can I request custom features for mobile app development?
items.answer: Of course! Our mobile app development is fully customizable. We use React Native and Flutter to build cross-platform apps with powerful native features. Share your requirements with our team and we’ll craft the best solution.

items.question: What sets ekalliptus apart from other digital agencies?
items.answer: We combine cutting-edge technology with user-centric design. Beyond clean code, we focus on memorable experiences through 3D elements, glassmorphism, and micro-interactions. Every project is handled personally by a dedicated team committed to your success.

items.question: Do you repair devices from all brands?
items.answer: Yes, we service a wide range of phone and laptop brands including Apple, Samsung, Xiaomi, ASUS, Lenovo, HP, Dell, and more. Our certified technicians handle diverse hardware and software issues with original spare parts and official warranties.

items.question: How much does professional photo & video editing cost?
items.answer: Pricing depends on the number of files, duration, and editing complexity. Photo editing starts from IDR 50,000 per photo, while video editing starts from IDR 500,000 for short standard edits. Contact us for a detailed quote tailored to your project.

notFound.description: The destination you were looking for isn’t available yet. Head back to the homepage and explore the experiences we’ve prepared.

order.title: Digital Service Order
order.subtitle: Get the best offer for your digital project. Expert team ready to help from consultation to implementation.
order.description: Tell us about your website development, custom WordPress, mobile app, or other digital needs in detail. Submissions sync to our internal dashboard and notify the ekalliptus team so we can respond with a proposal within 24 hours.

attachments.title: Attachments (Optional)
attachments.description: Upload reference files such as logos, brand guidelines, design examples, or project briefs. Maximum 5 files, 20MB per file.

order.descriptionSecondary: We support a wide range of digital needs: Indonesian website development, custom WordPress, Android and iOS mobile apps, professional device repair, and high-quality photo & video editing. Choose the service that fits and complete the form below.

projectDetails.title: Project Details
projectDetails.description: The information you share helps us craft the most relevant solution and accurate estimates for website development, custom WordPress, mobile apps, and other digital services.

notes.title: Notes
notes.description: Documents sync directly to our internal sheet for website development, custom WordPress, mobile apps, device repair, and photo/video editing. If you need to send additional assets (wireframes, requirements, etc.), reply to the confirmation email after submitting this form.
notes.privacy: We keep your data confidential and use it only to communicate about your website, WordPress, mobile app, or digital service project.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to ekalliptus ("we," "us," or "our"). This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website ekalliptus.com and use our digital services, including website development, mobile app development, and multimedia editing services.
introduction.content2: We are committed to protecting your personal data and respecting your privacy in accordance with applicable data protection laws, including the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA), the Personal Data Protection Act (PDPA) of Singapore, and other relevant regional regulations.
introduction.content3: This Privacy Policy applies to all information collected through our website, mobile applications, email communications, and any other digital platforms operated by ekalliptus.

personalInfo.title: 2.1 Personal Information
personalInfo.content: We may collect the following types of personal information:
items: Name, email address, phone number, and contact details
Company information and job title
Payment information (processed securely through third-party payment processors)
Project requirements and communication history
IP address and geolocation data
Government-issued identifiers when required for service delivery
Marketing preferences and communication consent records
User-generated content including feedback, reviews, and testimonials

technicalInfo.title: 2.2 Technical Information
technicalInfo.content: We automatically collect certain technical information when you visit our website:
items: Browser type and version
Operating system
Device information including hardware model and software version
Pages visited and time spent on our website
Referring website addresses
Clickstream data and user interaction patterns
Device identifiers and advertising identifiers
Network and connection information
Performance and diagnostic data

sensitiveInfo.title: 2.3 Sensitive Information
sensitiveInfo.content: We may collect sensitive personal information only with your explicit consent:
items: Biometric data for authentication purposes
Health-related information when relevant to service delivery
Financial information for payment processing
Government identification numbers when legally required

howWeUseInformation.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
howWeUseInformation.content: We use your information for the following purposes:
items: To provide and maintain our digital services
To process and fulfill your orders and payments
To communicate with you about your projects and inquiries
To improve our website and services through analytics and feedback
To send you marketing communications (with your consent)
To comply with legal obligations and regulatory requirements
To protect against fraud, ensure security, and prevent abuse
To conduct research and analysis to improve our offerings
To personalize user experience and deliver relevant content
To maintain accurate records and support business operations

legalBasis.title: 4. Legal Basis for Processing
legalBasis.content: Under applicable data protection laws, we process your personal data based on the following legal bases:
items: Consent: When you explicitly provide consent for specific processing activities
Contract: When processing is necessary for the performance of our service contract
Legal Obligation: When we are required to process data by law or regulatory authorities
Legitimate Interest: When processing is necessary for our legitimate business interests, provided your fundamental rights and freedoms are not overridden
Vital Interests: When processing is necessary to protect your vital interests or those of another person
Public Task: When processing is necessary for tasks carried out in the public interest

cookies.title: 5. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience on our website. Our cookie policy includes:

essential.title: 5.1 Essential Cookies
essential.content: These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be disabled in our systems. They include authentication, security, and session management cookies.

analytics.title: 5.2 Analytics Cookies
analytics.content: We use Google Analytics, Hotjar, and similar tools to understand how our website is used, analyze user behavior, and improve our services. All analytics data is anonymized and aggregated.

marketing.title: 5.3 Marketing Cookies
marketing.content: These cookies are used to deliver relevant advertisements, track marketing campaign effectiveness, and personalize marketing content across platforms.

functional.title: 5.4 Functional Cookies
functional.content: These cookies enable enhanced functionality and personalization, such as remembering your preferences and customizing content.

cookies.control: You can control cookie settings through your browser preferences and our cookie consent banner. Please note that disabling certain cookies may affect website functionality and user experience.

dataSharing.title: 6. Data Sharing and Disclosure
dataSharing.content: We may share your information with:
items: Service Providers: Third-party companies that assist us in operating our website and conducting our business, including cloud hosting providers, analytics services, and customer support platforms
Payment Processors: Secure payment processing services to handle transactions
Legal Authorities: When required by law, court order, or to protect our rights and safety
Business Transfers: In connection with mergers, acquisitions, or asset sales with appropriate safeguards
Affiliate Partners: With your consent, for joint service offerings or marketing campaigns
Research Partners: Anonymized and aggregated data for research and analytics purposes
dataSharing.noSale: We do not sell your personal information to third parties for marketing purposes. Any sharing of data is conducted under strict confidentiality agreements and data protection standards.
dataSharing.international: International data transfers are conducted using appropriate safeguards including Standard Contractual Clauses (SCCs), Binding Corporate Rules (BCRs), or other legally recognized mechanisms.

dataSecurity.title: 7. Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement comprehensive technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. These measures include:
items: End-to-end SSL/TLS encryption for all data transmissions
AES-256 encryption for stored sensitive data
Secure password hashing using bcrypt or equivalent algorithms
Regular security assessments, penetration testing, and vulnerability scanning
Multi-factor authentication and access controls
Employee training on data protection and security best practices
Data minimization and purpose limitation principles
Regular backups and disaster recovery procedures
Incident response and breach notification procedures
Privacy by design and by default in system development

dataBreaches.title: 8. Data Breach Notification
dataBreaches.content: In the event of a personal data breach, we will:
items: Assess the breach and determine potential risks to your rights and freedoms
Notify relevant regulatory authorities within 72 hours of becoming aware of the breach (where required)
Notify affected individuals without undue delay if the breach poses a high risk
Provide detailed information about the breach and recommended protective measures
Take immediate steps to contain the breach and prevent further damage

gdpr.title: 9.1 GDPR Rights
gdpr.content: Under GDPR, you have the right to:
items: Access your personal data and obtain a copy
Rectify inaccurate or incomplete personal data
Erase your personal data ("right to be forgotten")
Restrict processing of your personal data in certain circumstances
Data portability - receive your data in a structured, machine-readable format
Object to processing based on legitimate interests
Withdraw consent at any time for consent-based processing
Not be subject to automated decision-making or profiling
Lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority

ccpa.title: 9.2 CCPA Rights
ccpa.content: Under CCPA, California residents have the right to:
items: Know what personal information is being collected and how it's used
Delete personal information held by us
Opt-out of sale or sharing of personal information
Non-discrimination for exercising privacy rights
Receive detailed privacy information upon request

exercise.title: 9.3 Exercising Your Rights
exercise.content: To exercise your rights, please contact us using the information provided in the Contact section. We will respond to your request within the legally prescribed timeframe (typically 30 days for GDPR requests).

dataRetention.title: 10. Data Retention
dataRetention.content: We retain your personal data only as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected, comply with legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce our agreements. The retention period varies depending on the type of data and the legal requirements.

periods.title: 10.1 Retention Periods
items: Project and transaction records: 7 years for tax and legal compliance
Customer communications: 3 years after project completion
Analytics and usage data: 26 months in anonymized form
Marketing consent records: 5 years after last interaction
Employment and contractor records: 7 years after termination

criteria.title: 10.2 Retention Criteria
criteria.content: We determine retention periods based on:
items: Legal and regulatory requirements
Contractual obligations
Business needs and operational requirements
Statute of limitations for potential legal claims
Historical and archival value

internationalTransfers.title: 11. International Data Transfers
internationalTransfers.content: Your personal data may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your country of residence. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place for such transfers:

mechanisms.title: 11.1 Transfer Mechanisms
mechanisms.content: We use the following mechanisms for international data transfers:
items: Standard Contractual Clauses (SCCs) approved by the European Commission
Binding Corporate Rules (BCRs) for intra-organizational transfers
Adequacy decisions for countries recognized as providing adequate protection
Specific consent from data subjects for certain transfers
Contractual safeguards with third-party service providers

risks.title: 11.2 Risk Assessment
risks.content: We conduct risk assessments for international transfers and implement additional measures where necessary to ensure your data remains protected.

childrensPrivacy.title: 12. Children's Privacy
childrensPrivacy.content: Our services are not intended for individuals under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 18 without parental consent. If you become aware that we have collected information from a child under 18, please contact us immediately.

parentalConsent.title: 12.1 Parental Consent
parentalConsent.content: If we discover that we have collected personal information from a child without parental consent, we will take steps to delete such information promptly.

educational.title: 12.2 Educational Services
educational.content: For educational services directed at minors, we obtain verifiable parental consent before collecting any personal information.

thirdPartyLinks.title: 13. Third-Party Websites and Links
thirdPartyLinks.content: Our website may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of these external sites. We encourage you to review the privacy policies of any third-party websites you visit.

socialMedia.title: 13.1 Social Media Integration
socialMedia.content: Our integration with social media platforms may result in data collection by those platforms. Please review their respective privacy policies for more information.

changes.title: 14. Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices, legal requirements, or business operations. We will notify you of any material changes by:

notification.title: 14.1 Notification Methods
notification.content: We will notify you of changes through:
items: Email notification for registered users
Website banners and prominent notices
In-app notifications for mobile applications
Direct communication for significant changes

changes.review: You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. Your continued use of our services after any changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.

contact.title: 15. Contact Information
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or wish to exercise your rights, please contact us:
contact.responseTime: Response Time: We will respond to your inquiry within 30 days of receipt as required by GDPR.

dpo.title: 15.1 Data Protection Officer
dpo.content: Our Data Protection Officer can be contacted at dpo@ekalliptus.com for privacy-related concerns.

complaints.title: 15.2 Regulatory Complaints
complaints.content: If you are not satisfied with our response to your privacy concerns, you have the right to lodge a complaint with the relevant data protection authority in your jurisdiction.

agreement.title: 1. Agreement to Terms
agreement.content: Welcome to ekalliptus ("Company," "we," "us," or "our"). These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your access to and use of our website, services, and products (collectively, the "Services").
agreement.content2: By accessing or using our Services, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you disagree with any part of these terms, then you may not access Service.

description.title: 2. Description of Services
description.content: ekalliptus provides digital agency services including but not limited to:
items: Website development and design
WordPress customization and development
Mobile application development
Multimedia editing services
Digital consulting and strategy
SEO optimization services
Technical support and maintenance

userResponsibilities.title: 3. User Responsibilities
userResponsibilities.content: As a user of our Services, you agree to:
items: Provide accurate, current, and complete information when required
Maintain the security of your account credentials and notify us immediately of any unauthorized use
Not use our Services for any illegal, unauthorized, or fraudulent purpose
Not interfere with or disrupt the Services or servers connected to the Services
Not attempt to gain unauthorized access to our systems, networks, or data
Respect intellectual property rights of ekalliptus and third parties
Comply with all applicable laws, regulations, and industry standards
Use the Services in accordance with any applicable documentation and guidelines
Not upload or transmit malicious code, viruses, or harmful content
Not engage in spam, phishing, or other deceptive practices
Cooperate with security investigations and report suspicious activities

prohibitedUses.title: 3.1 Prohibited Uses
items: Reverse engineering, decompiling, or attempting to extract source code
Using automated tools to access the Services without permission
Impersonating any person or entity or misrepresenting your affiliation
Violating any applicable export control laws or regulations
Interfering with or circumventing any security features of the Services

fees.title: 4.1 Fees and Payment
fees.content: Fees for our Services are outlined in project proposals and agreements. Payment terms typically include:
items: Initial deposit (typically 30-50% of total project cost) due upon project commencement
Milestone payments as specified in project timeline and deliverables
Final payment upon project completion and delivery of final deliverables
All prices are quoted in the currency specified in the agreement (typically USD or IDR)
Taxes and government fees are additional unless otherwise specified
Payment methods include bank transfer, credit card, and digital payment platforms

latePayments.title: 4.2 Late Payments
latePayments.content: Late payments may incur interest at the rate of 1.5% per month or the maximum rate permitted by law, whichever is lower. We reserve the right to suspend services for accounts with overdue payments after providing written notice.
latePayments.collection: We may engage third-party collection agencies for delinquent accounts, and you will be responsible for reasonable collection costs.

refundPolicy.title: 4.3 Refund Policy
refundPolicy.content: Refunds are handled on a case-by-case basis and are subject to the terms outlined in your specific service agreement. Deposits for custom work are generally non-refundable once work has commenced.

conditions.title: 4.3.1 Refund Conditions
conditions.content: Refunds may be considered under the following circumstances:
items: Service cancellation before work commencement (full deposit refund)
Significant deviation from agreed deliverables or quality standards
Failure to meet mutually agreed deadlines without reasonable cause
Technical issues that prevent service delivery and cannot be resolved

disputes.title: 4.4 Payment Disputes
disputes.content: If you dispute any charge, you must notify us in writing within 30 days of the charge date. We will investigate and respond within 15 business days.

company.title: 5.1 Company Intellectual Property
company.content: The Services and its original content, features, functionality, and proprietary technology are and will remain the exclusive property of ekalliptus and its licensors. The Services are protected by copyright, trademark, trade secret, and other intellectual property laws.

examples.title: 5.1.1 Company IP Examples
examples.content: This includes but is not limited to:
items: Source code, algorithms, and software architecture
Business processes, methodologies, and workflows
Brand names, logos, and marketing materials
Documentation, training materials, and proprietary tools
Website design elements and user interface components

client.title: 5.2 Client Intellectual Property
client.content: Upon full payment, clients receive ownership of the final deliverables as specified in their service agreement, excluding any third-party components, tools, or proprietary ekalliptus technologies used in development.

license.title: 5.2.1 License Grant
license.content: ekalliptus retains a non-exclusive, royalty-free license to use, modify, and display project deliverables for portfolio purposes, marketing, and demonstration of our capabilities, unless specifically prohibited by the client agreement.

materials.title: 5.3 Client Materials
materials.content: Clients grant ekalliptus a non-exclusive, worldwide, royalty-free license to use any materials provided by the client for the purpose of delivering the Services. This license includes the right to modify, reproduce, and distribute such materials as necessary for service delivery.

warranty.title: 5.3.1 Client Material Warranty
warranty.content: Clients warrant that they have all necessary rights to provide materials to ekalliptus and that such materials do not infringe any third-party intellectual property rights.

thirdParty.title: 5.4 Third-Party Components
thirdParty.content: Some deliverables may incorporate third-party components, open-source software, or licensed materials. Clients will receive appropriate licenses for such components as specified in the project agreement.

confidentiality.title: 6. Confidentiality
confidentiality.content: Both parties agree to maintain the confidentiality of proprietary information exchanged during the course of business. This includes but is not limited to:
items: Business strategies and plans
Technical specifications and source code
Customer information and data
Financial information
Any information marked as confidential
confidentiality.survival: This confidentiality obligation survives the termination of these Terms.

limitationOfLiability.title: 7. Limitation of Liability
limitationOfLiability.content: TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW, ekalliptus SHALL NOT BE LIABLE FOR ANY INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, CONSEQUENTIAL, OR PUNITIVE DAMAGES, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO LOSS OF PROFITS, DATA, USE, OR GOODWILL, ARISING OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THESE TERMS OR THE SERVICES.
limitationOfLiability.content2: OUR TOTAL LIABILITY FOR ANY CLAIM ARISING OUT OF OR RELATING TO THESE TERMS OR THE SERVICES SHALL NOT EXCEED THE AMOUNT PAID BY YOU FOR THE SERVICES GIVING RISE TO THE CLAIM.
limitationOfLiability.disclaimer: SOME JURISDICTIONS DO NOT ALLOW THE EXCLUSION OF CERTAIN WARRANTIES OR LIMITATION OF LIABILITY, SO THESE EXCLUSIONS MAY NOT APPLY TO YOU.

disclaimerOfWarranties.title: 8. Disclaimer of Warranties
disclaimerOfWarranties.content: THE SERVICES ARE PROVIDED ON AN "AS IS" AND "AS AVAILABLE" BASIS. WE MAKE NO REPRESENTATIONS OR WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, REGARDING THE OPERATION OR AVAILABILITY OF THE SERVICES.
disclaimerOfWarranties.content2: WE DISCLAIM ALL WARRANTIES, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO:
items: WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY OR FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE
WARRANTIES OF NON-INFRINGEMENT
WARRANTIES ARISING FROM COURSE OF DEALING OR USAGE OF TRADE

serviceAvailability.title: 9. Service Availability
serviceAvailability.content: We strive to maintain high availability of our Services, but we do not guarantee uninterrupted access. We may:
items: Perform scheduled maintenance with reasonable notice
Temporarily suspend services for security or technical reasons
Modify or discontinue services with appropriate notice
serviceAvailability.liability: We are not liable for any losses resulting from service interruptions.

termination.title: 10. Termination
termination.content: Either party may terminate these Terms under the following circumstances:
items: With 30 days written notice for convenience
Immediately for material breach of these Terms
Immediately if either party becomes insolvent or bankrupt
termination.obligations: Upon termination, you must cease all use of the Services and pay any outstanding fees. Sections that by their nature should survive termination shall continue to apply.

governingLaw.title: 11.1 Governing Law
governingLaw.content: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Indonesia, without regard to its conflict of law principles.

arbitration.title: 11.2 Arbitration
arbitration.content: Any dispute arising from or relating to these Terms or the Services shall be resolved through binding arbitration in accordance with the rules of the Indonesian Arbitration Association. The arbitration shall be conducted in the Indonesian language and held in Jakarta, Indonesia.

classActionWaiver.title: 11.3 Class Action Waiver
classActionWaiver.content: You agree to resolve disputes individually and waive any right to participate in class actions, class-wide arbitrations, or representative proceedings.

indemnification.title: 12. Indemnification
indemnification.content: You agree to indemnify, defend, and hold harmless ekalliptus and its officers, directors, employees, and agents from and against any claims, damages, losses, liabilities, and expenses (including reasonable attorneys' fees) arising out of or relating to your use of the Services, violation of these Terms, or violation of any rights of another.

forceMajeure.title: 13. Force Majeure
forceMajeure.content: We shall not be liable for any failure or delay in performance under these Terms due to circumstances beyond our reasonable control, including but not limited to acts of God, war, terrorism, natural disasters, labor disputes, or government actions.

changes.title: 14. Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting on our website. Your continued use of Services after any changes constitutes acceptance of the new Terms.

notification.title: 14.1 Change Notification
notification.content: We will notify you of material changes through:
items: Email notification for registered users
Website banners and prominent notices
In-app notifications for mobile applications
Direct communication for significant changes
Social media announcements for major updates

effect.title: 14.2 Effect of Changes
effect.content: Your continued use of Services after any changes constitutes acceptance of the modified Terms. If you do not agree to the new Terms, you must cease using the Services.

severability.title: 15. Severability
severability.content: If any provision of these Terms is found to be unenforceable or invalid, that provision shall be limited or eliminated to the minimum extent necessary so that the remaining Terms shall remain in full force and effect.

interpretation.title: 15.1 Interpretation
interpretation.content: These Terms shall be interpreted fairly and in accordance with their plain meaning. Headings are for convenience only and do not affect interpretation.

entireAgreement.title: 16. Entire Agreement
entireAgreement.content: These Terms, together with any service agreements or project proposals referenced herein, constitute the entire agreement between you and ekalliptus regarding the Services and supersede all prior agreements, whether written or oral.

interpretation.title: 16.1 Interpretation
interpretation.content: These Terms shall be interpreted fairly and in accordance with their plain meaning. Headings are for convenience only and do not affect interpretation.

assignment.title: 17. Assignment
assignment.content: You may not assign or transfer these Terms or any rights or obligations hereunder without our prior written consent. We may freely assign these Terms.

successors.title: 17.1 Successors and Assigns
successors.content: These Terms shall be binding upon and inure to the benefit of the parties and their respective successors and permitted assigns.

contact.title: 18. Contact Information
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us:
contact.businessHours: Business Hours: Monday - Friday, 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM WIB (Western Indonesia Time)

address.title: 18.1 Business Address
address.content: For legal notices and official correspondence, please use our registered business address as listed on our website.

emergency.title: 18.2 Emergency Contact
emergency.content: For urgent legal matters requiring immediate attention, please mark your email as "URGENT LEGAL MATTER" in the subject line.

language.title: 18.3 Language
language.content: These Terms are provided in English. All communications and notices shall be in English unless otherwise required by applicable law.

compliance.title: 19. Regulatory Compliance
compliance.content: Both parties agree to comply with all applicable laws, regulations, and industry standards. This includes but is not limited to:
items: Data protection and privacy laws (GDPR, CCPA, PDPA, etc.)
Consumer protection regulations
Export control and sanctions compliance
Anti-corruption and anti-bribery laws
Industry-specific regulations and standards

waiver.title: 20. Waiver
waiver.content: No waiver of any provision of these Terms shall be effective unless in writing and signed by both parties. Any failure to exercise a right or timely objection to changes shall constitute a waiver of that right.

severability.title: 20. Severability
severability.content: If any provision of these Terms is held to be invalid or unenforceable by a court of competent jurisdiction, the remaining provisions shall remain in full force and effect.

notices.title: 21. Notices
notices.content: All notices required under these Terms shall be in writing and delivered to the addresses specified in the contact section. Notices shall be deemed received when actually received.

electronic.title: 21.1 Electronic Notices
electronic.content: Electronic notices shall be deemed received when transmitted to the specified email address, unless sender receives notification of non-delivery.
